import React from 'react' import { useSelector} from 'react-redux' import { useParams } from 'react-router' import LeftSidebar from '../../component/LeftSidebar/LeftSidebar' import Avatar from '../../component/Avatar/Avatar' const UserProfile = () => { const { id } = useParams const users = useSelector((state) => state.usersReducer) const currentProfile = users.filter((user) => user._id === id) const currentUser = useSelector((state) => state.currentReducer) return (
) } export default UserProfile
